description: UMD 1.9.1 is the thirteenth release of UMD-1 (Unified Middleware Distribution) made available for the EGI production infrastructure. This release provides security fix from Technology Providers.
releaseNotes: <div>This release contains the following products:</div><div><b>IGE Technology Provider:</b><br></div><div>File Transfer and File Access:&nbsp;GRIDFTP 5.2.2 release in SL5</div><div><ul><li>New support for default disk and network stacks: globus-gridftp-server options -dc-default and -fs-default.&nbsp;<br></li><li>Several bug fixes<br></li><li>Added server support for setting file modification time.<br></li><li>Added ability (MLSC) to stream directory listings over the control channel.<br></li></ul></div>
installationNotes: <div>All products in the UMD 1.9.1 release were verified against EGI's current Quality Criteria&nbsp;(for further information, please see the documentation links) to support 64 bit Scientific Linux 5 (x86_64 processor architecture).&nbsp;</div><div>Installation and configuration notes are available in the EGI repository: <a href="http://repository.egi.eu/category/umd_releases/distribution/umd_1/.">http://repository.egi.eu/category/umd_releases/distribution/umd_1/.</a></div>
contact: For further information about the UMD, its goals and surrounding processes, and more information about how to engage as a Technology Provider with EGI, please send an Email to: cto (at) egi.eu.
technicalContact: For any bugs and issues you encounter that are not described in the release notes of this UMD release, or the related documentation provided by the Technology Providers, please visit the <a href="http://ggus.eu">EGI Helpdesk</a> to make a report
knownIssues: Details containing known issues and workarounds found in EGI verification and staged rollout are collected in: <a href="https://wiki.egi.eu/wiki/UMD-1:UMD-1.9.1">https://wiki.egi.eu/wiki/UMD-1:UMD-1.9.1</a>
changeLog: <div>This release contains updates of the following components:</div><div><ul><li>&nbsp; &nbsp; IGE GRIDFTP 5.2.2<br></li></ul></div>

products.name: ige.globus-gram5
products.description: The Grid Resource Allocation and Management (GRAM5) from the Globus Toolkit

products.name: ige.globus-gridftp
products.description: The GridFTP server and clients from the Globus Toolkit
